hiveArticle.title: Marketing Strategy by GitLab
hiveArticle.body:
So yesterday Microsoft acquired GitHub, now people started moving their private repo from GitHub to either BitBucket or GitLab. GitLab company sensed this opportunity and they have started to analyze the trend. The trend was seen as #movingtogitlab in Twitter, thus GitLab was fast to acknowledge the fact and created a blog post - https://about.gitlab.com/2018/06/03/movingtogitlab/. 

This was the trend seen in Twitter. 

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaebr5dfhyjkEW9vvMJ1amwFuJFqMP394YJqzKpWUyeCm/image.png)
PC : https://twitter.com/vicinitas_io

They have also created a Video explaining how to Move from GitHub to GitLab and giving discounts to the new users "New users get a 75% discount on GitLab's top tier plans"

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VYOXuOg9tQI" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>
 Note : Video taken from youtube and its not mine. 

## This is called as a great marketing Strategy.
